title: Gannett 's revenue 2013 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenue in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 6.
In general Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 3.32 was reached at Year 2013
The lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 2.89 was reported at Year 2015
